name: Stephania Erecta
water_requirement_description: Water sparingly, letting the soil dry out—its caudex stores moisture.
sunlight_requirement_description: Loves bright, indirect light—keep near a window but avoid harsh sun.

name: Orange Succulent
water_requirement_description: Water only when the soil is bone dry—its plump leaves store moisture.
sunlight_requirement_description: Thrives in bright, direct light—keep it by a sunny window but watch for sunburn.

name: Sekka Hinoki Cypress Japanese Bonsai
water_requirement_description: Water deeply 4 times a week—bonsai soil dries out quickly and needs consistent moisture.
sunlight_requirement_description: Thrives in bright, filtered light—place near a sunny window with some morning sun exposure.

name: Japanese Maple Bonsai
water_requirement_description: Water deeply 4 times a week—bonsai soil dries out quickly and needs consistent moisture.
sunlight_requirement_description: Thrives in bright, filtered light—place near a sunny window with morning sun but avoid harsh afternoon heat.

name: Japanese Shimpaku Juniper Bonsai
water_requirement_description: Water deeply 4 times a week—juniper bonsai prefer consistently moist but well-draining soil.
sunlight_requirement_description: Thrives in bright, direct light—place near a sunny window or balcony for strong, healthy growth.

name: Senna Meridionalis
water_requirement_description: Water 2 times a week—since it's a desert plant, it stores moisture and thrives with less frequent watering.
sunlight_requirement_description: Thrives in bright, direct light—place in a sunny spot for optimal growth and flowering.

name: Stephania Suberosa
water_requirement_description: Water once a week—its caudex stores water, making it drought-tolerant.
sunlight_requirement_description: Thrives in bright, indirect light—keep near a window but away from intense sun to prevent stress.

name: Fire Fern
water_requirement_description: Water 3 times a week—this humidity loving plant prefers consistently moist soil but not soggy.
sunlight_requirement_description: Thrives in bright, indirect light—keep near a window with filtered sunlight for best growth.

name: Clover
water_requirement_description: Water 3 times a week, clover enjoys consistently moist soil but can tolerate short dry periods.
sunlight_requirement_description: Thrives in bright, filtered light—does well with some morning sun but prefers shade during the hottest part of the day.
